title: Water into gold
brief_description: Discusses Australia’s water resources in terms of storage and usage. Examines different methods of irrigation, and depicts irrigation systems and areas in Victoria.
description: Discusses Australia’s water resources in terms of storage and usage. Examines different methods of irrigation, and depicts irrigation systems and areas in Victoria.
